alert.note: Alert for Sanilac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:19PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sanilac County through 245 PM EDT... At 219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sandusky, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sandusky around 230 PM EDT. Carsonville around 240 PM EDT. Deckerville around 245 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Tyre, Palms, Watertown, McGregor, Forester, Minden, Elmer and Richmondville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
